content.body: reviewing accessor in the decorator proposal
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: reviewing accessor in the decorator proposal

content.body: I have a question. In the `@logged accessor x` example, is it possible to use `this.#x`  to access the derived private field to bypass the decorated accessor and access the original value?
content.formatted_body: I have a question. In the @logged accessor x example, is it possible to use this.#x to access the derived private field to bypass the decorated accessor and access the original value?

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: I have a question. In the `@logged accessor x` example, is it possible to use `this.#x`  to access the derived private field to bypass the decorated accessor and access the original value?
I have a question. In the @logged accessor x example, is it possible to use this.#x to access the derived private field to bypass the decorated accessor and access the original value?

content.body: it should not be possible to access a private field inside the class body that was declared by the decorator
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: it should not be possible to access a private field inside the class body that was declared by the decorator

content.body: iow, `this.#x` should only work if the class body declares `#x`, statically
content.formatted_body: iow, this.#x should only work if the class body declares #x, statically

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: iow, `this.#x` should only work if the class body declares `#x`, statically
iow, this.#x should only work if the class body declares #x, statically
